description:
At 19, Beau is a total bad boy and adventure seeker. He’s had sex with a girl in the subway and he's jumped out of an airplane. He parties hard with the girls, surfs, snowboards, and lives life to its limits. Now he can add that he’s dropped his load in front of the camera.

Beau was totally turned on by being filmed. In fact, on his first day, he was so turned on that he shot his load over seven feet! Then, the next day this boy followed up with another cum shot that soaked his chest. Hot!
title: Beau
